tooltip.catalyze_mod.blazing:
"With the infusion of the fiery rods
 of the nether's inferno,
 set your weapon ablaze..."
tooltip.catalyze_mod.freezing:
"With the infusion of the icy blue
 of the frozen ice peaks,
 englobe your enemies in a frozen cube..."
tooltip.catalyze_mod.venomous:
"With the infusion of the poisonous
 eyes of a spider of the deep caves,
 sicken your foes..."
tooltip.catalyze_mod.blinding:
"With the infusion of the shards
 of the abyss of the world,
 carve the eyes of anyone..."
tooltip.catalyze_mod.serrated:
"With the infusion of the sharpest
 teeth of the monsters of the world,
 leave deep wounds in your enemies..."
tooltip.catalyze_mod.piercing:
"With the infusion of the
 piercing prismarine crystals,
 pierce through the heavens..."
tooltip.catalyze_mod.haste:
"With the infusion of the
 golden energy,
 strike with the speed of light..."
tooltip.catalyze_mod.blood_reaper:
"With the infusion of the
 essence of the reaper,
 harvest the life of your foes..."
